Name: SeriesContext
Description: A Classification Series can be designed in a specific context. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: UnitTypeClassifiedReference
Description: A Classification Series is designed to classify a specific type of object/unit according to a specific attribute. TypeOfObject should be set to UnitType.

Name: SubjectArea
Description: Areas of statistics in which the Classification Series is implemented. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: OwnerReference
Description: The statistical office or other authority, which created and maintains the Statistical Classification(s) related to the Classification Series. A Classification Series may have several owners. TypeOfObject should be set to Organization or Individual.

Name: Keyword
Description: A Classification Series can be associated with one or a number of keywords. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: StatisticalClassificationReference
Description: A Classification Series has at least one Statistical Classification. Allows for in-line entry of a Statistical Classification.

Name: CurrentStatisticalClassificationReference
Description: If there are several Statistical Classifications related to a Classification Series, one Statistical Classification may be assigned as the currently valid Statistical Classification. TypeOfObject should be set to StatisticalClassification.
